feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 34. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
